item.description:
This will be the very first Meetup for The Greater Boston Neuro Linguistic Programming Meetup Group!
We'll use the time to get to know each other, talk about our different experiences with NLP, and discuss what we want out of our Meetup.

Please note that we'll be having dinner at Union Street Restaurant (if you'd like), and that Meetup.com charges us a small fee for using their services, which will average out to about $2 per person per meeting.

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Neuro Linguistic Programming August Meetup
